dct_description_sm: engraved by permission, from A.J. Marks' large chromo lithograph ; [Geo. F. Cram engraver and publisher].
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Features illustrations of ships and settlements.
Shows topography, drainage, places of historical interest.
Appears in Unrivaled atlas of the world.
